TxStatus_cancel in Aion.executeCall (/unique_chucks/11/0xcbe7ab529a147149b1cf982c3a169f728bc0c3ca.sol#162-163) is a local variable never initialiazed

Aion.executeCall (/unique_chucks/11/0xcbe7ab529a147149b1cf982c3a169f728bc0c3ca.sol#147-171) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(blocknumber <= block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/11/0xcbe7ab529a147149b1cf982c3a169f728bc0c3ca.sol#152)

Aion.cancellScheduledTx (/unique_chucks/11/0xcbe7ab529a147149b1cf982c3a169f728bc0c3ca.sol#174-194) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(blocknumber >= block.timestamp + (180) || blocknumber <= block.timestamp - (300)) (/unique_chucks/11/0xcbe7ab529a147149b1cf982c3a169f728bc0c3ca.sol#176-177)

Aion.updatefee (/unique_chucks/11/0xcbe7ab529a147149b1cf982c3a169f728bc0c3ca.sol#208-226) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(feeChangeInterval < block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/11/0xcbe7ab529a147149b1cf982c3a169f728bc0c3ca.sol#209-211)
